overview: Timothy Lupo is a Boston-based online marketing, social media and SEO specialist for Fresh Tilled Soil, a leading UI web design firm. Timothy focuses on Fresh Tilled Soil’s entire online marketing efforts. Timothy is not only an online marketing professional for Fresh Tilled Soil, but also the voice of “A Digital Boy in a Digital World,” his personal blog dedicated to the continued discussion of online digital media and marketing. Timothy love’s Boston area start-up’s and continues to make great strides in helping businesses connect with their customers online.
